alert.note: Alert for Morton; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:36PM CDT until May 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MORTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL OLIVER COUNTIES... At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Center, or 20 miles northwest of Mandan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Morton and south central Oliver Counties, including the following locations... Nelson Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
